thread.title: Lee Chaeyeon Reveals Agonizing MRI Scan—Says She Won't Be Dancing For A While - Koreaboo
thread.title_full: Lee Chaeyeon Reveals Agonizing MRI Scan—Says She Won't Be Dancing For A While - Koreaboo

author: Jenny Kang
title: Lee Chaeyeon Reveals Agonizing MRI Scan—Says She Won't Be Dancing For A While - Koreaboo
text:
Former IZ*ONE member turned soloist Lee Chaeyeon will be going on a “dance hiatus,” so it seems.
Lee Chaeyeon | @chaestival_/Instagram In a series of Instagram updates, the soloist revealed the state of her herniated discs…
| @chaestival_/Instagram Let’s stay together, friends… Please be good.
— Chaeyeon
…and commented that she won’t be pushing herself to dance for a while.
| @chaestival_/Instagram It’s a wonder how they didn’t herniate before. They put in some work.
— Chaeyeon
| @chaestival_/Instagram No more warming up like this. Although… That does feel really good.
— Chaeyeon
While Chaeyeon promised to get right back to it “in the new year…”
| @chaestival_/Instagram Closed… as in I won’t be dancing for a while, or whatever. I’ll be back on track by next year!
— Chaeyeon
…fans remain concerned for her, given her set schedule with SBS ‘s Shooting Stars (also known as Kick A Goal )—a show in which the soloist plays soccer, and are wishing her a restful time.
| theqoo “Take care, Chaeyeon, I love watching you dance… Wishing you a full recovery so you can keep on dancing!” “My favorite idols all have herniated discs, too… So I feel for her. It must be so painful.” “Oh, no… Take care of yourself!” “Gosh, that looks painful as heck.” “Herniated discs and dancers go together hand-in-hand. That must be so painful.” Source: theqoo
